name: Bread and Circuses (itch) (Vlakna, Fura-x, CamilleLny)
description:
Bread and Circuses is a real-time tower defense.

As a wealthy businessman, you have the ability to bend protesters' rebellious will by building new shops in their ways. No one refuses a new smartphone or a delicious burger.

Credits:

        -Designers: Vladimir Gaumert; Yang Yi

        -Programmers: Camille Launay; Florian Marcellot

-Game Artist: Raphaëlle Pichon; Juliette Marchal; Julie Lecouffe; Chloé Victor; Elias Baudu 

-Master Sound: Régis Royer
